name: Tranquil Serenity - GDKO #3
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move (Controller Support Added)

Z to Jump

Story: You're but a square named Square. You're great journey is now over. You have arrived in a peaceful paradise known as "Heaven" or Tranquil Haven. At first you love what you see. Afterlife is great, but you just cant shake off this nagging feeling..... This feeling that there is supposed to be more.
